Presenting at the IEEE CASE 2024 in Bari, Italy

Jeongwon Park gave a presentation in the IEEE International Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE) in Bari, Italy.
His presentation topic was “Efficient Job Shop Scheduling via Graph based Deep Reinforcement Learning with Adaptive Multi-Action Selection”.
